bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the Filing Department, Grand Rapids Herald, September 13, 1940

div1.p: Hench inquires about obtaining photos of William H. Dean from a newspaper article.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the Filing Department, Grand Rapids Herald, September 13, 1940
div1.opener:
Private William H. Dean--case “XY”
September 13, 1940
Filing Department
Grand Rapids Herald
Grand Rapids, Michigan
Gentlemen:
div1.p:
One of the librarians in Grand Rapids kindly
sent me a copy of the Grand Rapids Herald for August 26, 1928
in which you have quite an article on William H. Dean, includ-
ing a photograph of the Dean Memorial Bridge and several photo-
graphs of Mr. Dean himself. Do you still have these negatives
in your files? If you do, would it be possible for me to get
a copy of the one at the top of the page and No. 2, showing
Mr. Dean in dress uniform? I should appreciate this greatly
and would be glad to remit promptly.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
